p: In the MSK, the total flavonoid content was estimated as about 3325 ± 120 mg catechin equivalent (CE)/100 g seed [ 105]. The reported flavonoids content was higher than those reported in previous investigations, at about 10–1170 mg/100 g [ 55, 69, 106, 107]. With the rich presence of functional compounds, the MSK shows potential for the preparation of functional foods with health benefits.
